pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to Your 'Zoom' Data // Facilitates making a connection to the 'Zoom' API and executing various queries. You can use it to get data on 'Zoom' webinars and 'Zoom' meetings. The 'Zoom' documentation is available at https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/. This package is not supported by 'Zoom' (owner of the software).
